_sText:
This is a fun map. 
In it you must choose on of the ways represented in the spawn area (Deagle//AWP//M4 & AK-47). 
After choosing, simply complete the minigame to get a weapon and go into the arena. 


P.S:
-Afk's will be teleported after a certain time. 
-If there still are afk's left in the arena, they will start to get damaged after a few minutes.

-This map has a Secret Area named Buyzone.

-Oh, and having the NoBlock Add-on intalled on the server is advised :P
